Care Connect Residential Status

A CodeSystem that identifies the residential status of a patient.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

This code system https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-ResidentialStatus-1 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
H UK Resident
O Overseas Resident

name: Care Connect Residential Status
description: A CodeSystem that identifies the residential status of a patient.
